properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBERS ( MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PW , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_PHONE , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_TYPE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PW , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_PHONE , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_TYPE FROM MEMBERS A
SELECT MEMBER_TYPE FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
UPDATE MEMBERS SET MEMBER_TYPE = ? WHERE MEMBER_CODE = ?
